attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2003-1763

Date: 2003-11-05

                     Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que l'honorable Lynne C. Leitch, juge de la Cour supérieure de justice, soit nommée juge principale régionale de cette Cour pour la région sud-ouest, et juge d'office de la Cour d'appel de l'Ontario.

 

 


                     The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that the Honourable Lynne C. Leitch, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, be appointed Regional Senior Judge of this Court for the Southwest Region and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.

Leitch, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice, be appointed Regional Senior Judge of this Court for the Southwest Region and a Judge ex officio of the Court of Appeal for Ontario.
